title: Back to the Future
description: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

title: The Breakfast Club
description: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.

title: Brazil
description: A bureaucrat in a dystopic society becomes an enemy of the state as he pursues the woman of his dreams.

title: The Color Purple
description: A black Southern woman struggles to find her identity after suffering abuse from her father and others over four decades.

title: Out of Africa
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: In 20th-century colonial Kenya, a Danish baroness/plantation owner has a passionate love affair with a free-spirited big-game hunter.

title: Ran
description: In Medieval Japan, an elderly warlord retires, handing over his empire to his three sons. However, he vastly underestimates how the new-found power will corrupt them and cause them to turn on each other...and him.

title: Come and See
description: After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

title: Witness
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
description: A young Amish boy is sole witness to a murder; a policeman goes into hiding in Amish country to protect him until the trial.

title: The Goonies
description: A group of young misfits called The Goonies discover an ancient map and set out on an adventure to find a legendary pirate's long-lost treasure.

title: Clue
description: Six guests are anonymously invited to a strange mansion for dinner, but after their host is killed, they must cooperate with the staff to identify the murderer as the bodies pile up.

title: After Hours
description: An ordinary word processor has the worst night of his life after he agrees to visit a girl in Soho whom he met that evening at a coffee shop.

title: The Purple Rose of Cairo
description: In New Jersey during the Depression, a movie character walks off the screen and into the real world.

title: Shoah
description: Claude Lanzmann's epic documentary recounts the story of the Holocaust through interviews with witnesses - perpetrators as well as survivors.

title: Police Story
description: A virtuous Hong Kong police officer must clear his good name when the drug lord he is after frames him for the murder of a dirty cop.

title: Tampopo
description: A truck driver stops at a small family-run noodle shop and decides to help its fledgling business.

title: My Life as a Dog
description: A young boy is sent to live with relatives in a country village when his mother falls ill.

title: The Official Story
description: A high school history teacher sets out to find out who the mother of her adopted daughter is.

title: Vagabond
description: A defiant young woman wanders through the French countryside, her fate unfolding in flashbacks from those who encountered her.

title: Mishima: A Life in Four Chapters
description: A fictionalized account in four segments of the life of celebrated Japanese writer Yukio Mishima.

title: A Room with a View
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: In a Florence pension, the inhibited Lucy Honeychurch and her chaperone cousin Charlotte Bartlett find themselves in a socially awkward situation when they are offered rooms with a view by the liberal Mr. Emerson and his son George.

title: Kiss of the Spider Woman
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: A gay window dresser and a militant revolutionary are trapped together in a desolate South American prison cell.

title: The Trip to Bountiful
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: An elderly woman living with her son and daughter-in-law in a small apartment in Houston, Texas, wants to visit her childhood home in Bountiful one last time.

title: Mask
description: A teenager with a massive facial skull deformity and biker gang mother attempt to live as normal a life as possible.

title: Runaway Train
description: Two escaped convicts and a female railway worker find themselves trapped on a train with no brakes and nobody driving.

title: To Live and Die in L.A.
description: A fearless Secret Service agent will stop at nothing to bring down the counterfeiter who killed his partner.

title: Pale Rider
description: A mysterious preacher protects a humble prospector village from a greedy mining company trying to encroach on their land.

title: Silverado
description: A misfit bunch of friends come together to right the injustices which exist in a small town.

title: Pee-wee's Big Adventure
description: When eccentric man-child Pee-wee Herman gets his beloved bike stolen in broad daylight, he sets out across the U.S. on the adventure of his life.

title: Better Off Dead...
description: After his girlfriend ditches him for a boorish ski jock, Lane decides that suicide is the only answer. However, his increasingly inept attempts bring him only more agony and embarrassment.

title: The Sure Thing
description: College student Walter 'Gib' Gibson decides to go cross-country to visit his friend in California during winter break. A waiting 'sure thing' is the incentive.

title: Lost in America
description: A husband and wife in their 30s decide to quit their jobs, live as free spirits and cruise America in a Winnebago.

title: Secret Honor
description: In this monologue, President Richard Nixon sits alone in his office with a bottle of whiskey and a tape recorder and records his thoughts on his career and the Watergate scandal.

title: Day of the Dead
description: A small group of military officers and scientists dwell in an underground bunker as the world above is overrun by zombies.

title: The Return of the Living Dead
description: When two bumbling employees at a medical supply warehouse accidentally release a deadly gas into the air, the vapors cause the dead to rise again as zombies.

title: Re-Animator
description: A dedicated student at a medical college and his girlfriend become involved in bizarre experiments centering around the re-animation of dead tissue when an odd new student arrives on campus.

title: Fright Night
description: A teenager discovers that the newcomer in his neighborhood is a vampire, so he turns to an actor in a television horror show for help dealing with the undead.

title: A Zed & Two Noughts
description: Twin zoologists, whose wives die in the same car accident, become obsessed with the decomposition of life and with the woman who was driving the car.

title: Taipei Story
description: A former baseball player and his girlfriend, who works for a property developer, struggle to maintain their relationship as they face family and financial issues in 1980s Taipei.

title: The Time to Live and the Time to Die
description: A semi-autobiographical film about the filmmaker's childhood and adolescence growing up in Taiwan in the 1950s and 60s.

title: When Father Was Away on Business
description: In 1950s Yugoslavia, a young boy's father is sent to a labor camp, but his family tells him that he is away on business.

title: Colonel Redl
description: The rise and fall of Alfred Redl, an ambitious officer in the Austro-Hungarian army who becomes the head of counter-intelligence.

title: Angel's Egg
description: A mysterious young girl wanders a desolate, surreal landscape carrying a large egg.

title: Vampire Hunter D
description: In a post-apocalyptic future, a young woman hires a half-vampire, half-human hunter to protect her from a powerful vampire lord.

title: The Shooting Party
description: A group of aristocrats gathers for a shooting party at a country estate in 1913, unaware that their way of life is about to change forever.

title: Dance with a Stranger
description: The story of Ruth Ellis, the last woman to be hanged in Britain, and her turbulent relationship with racing driver David Blakely.

title: No End
description: In Poland during martial law, a ghost watches over his widow as she struggles to cope with his death and her own life.

title: Cocoon
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: When a group of trespassing seniors swim in a pool containing alien cocoons, they find themselves energized with youthful vigor.

title: Prizzi's Honor
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: A professional hitman falls for a woman who is also a hitman, and they are hired to kill each other.

title: Ladyhawke
description: A thief helps a captain and his lady love to break a curse that keeps them eternally separated.

title: Real Genius
description: Teenage geniuses deal with their abilities while developing a laser.

title: Commando
description: A retired Special Forces colonel tries to save his daughter, who was abducted by his former subordinate.

title: Rocky IV
description: Rocky Balboa proudly holds the world heavyweight boxing championship, but a new challenger has stepped forward: Drago, a six-foot-four, 261-pound fighter who has the backing of the Soviet Union.

title: A Chorus Line
description: Hopefuls try out for a Broadway musical.
